<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### Offset {#a57774fe0d26b4cf8af08ac1ed14dca74}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CSKYConstantIslandPass.cpp&#125;::CSKYConstantIslands::BasicBlockInfo::Offset = 0</>}>
Offset - Distance from the beginning of the function to the beginning of this basic block.

Offsets are computed assuming worst case padding before an aligned block. This means that subtracting basic block offsets always gives a conservative estimate of the real distance which may be smaller.

Because worst case padding is used, the computed offset of an aligned block may not actually be aligned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/csky/cskyconstantislandpass-cpp/#l00096">96</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/csky/cskyconstantislandpass-cpp">CSKYConstantIslandPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Size {#a2310cfb9d2a14243cffabaac67402574}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CSKYConstantIslandPass.cpp&#125;::CSKYConstantIslands::BasicBlockInfo::Size = 0</>}>
Size - Size of the basic block in bytes.

If the block contains inline assembly, this is a worst case estimate.

The size does not include any alignment padding whether from the beginning of the block, or from an aligned jump table at the end.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/csky/cskyconstantislandpass-cpp/#l00103">103</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/csky/cskyconstantislandpass-cpp">CSKYConstantIslandPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
